RT @pimskeks: Weather/Calculator app not opening after jailbreaking your iOS7 device? See my solution here: http://t.co/bZZKXLF8yk
A quick way to check if you're affected: search for a recently-released package (like SSLPatch) in Cydia. If you can find it, you're good.
This isn't a fix we can release for the affected devices via an evasi0n package update in Cydia, since they aren't getting package updates.
FYI: It's only necessary to restore and jailbreak again with 1.0.7 if your Cydia isn't getting new/updated packages.
evasi0n7 1.0.7 is now live on http://t.co/kjpfxng23O - fixing problem where the bundled package lists could not be updated by Cydia.
